output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 31240006 is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion" who is one of the official presidential candidates (Position 2)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Reaches between 500,001 and 1,000,000 people - Has already gathered 10,000-14,999 impressions - Uses national flag emojis and hashtags to maximize reach
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Direct call for "George Simion Președinte" (George Simion President) - Uses campaign-specific hashtags (#Alegeri2024 #Președinte) - Clear endorsement for presidency
5. Journalism: No - This is not journalistic content - No informational or educational value - Pure campaign slogan and endorsement
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a paid, structured campaign message - Contains official campaign elements (CMF number) - Posted by a company (SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO SRL)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official campaign identifier (CMF) - Direct presidential endorsement - Paid distribution - Wide reach - Clear electoral message - Posted by a media company - Uses campaign hashtags and symbols
conclusion.message-for-police: SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul GEORGE-NICOLAE SIMION (AUR) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Postarea cu ID-ul 1136207171352012 este un anunt platit pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un buget de 100-199 RON, care a ajuns la 10.000-14.999 de persoane, continand mesajul explicit "George Simion Președinte" insotit de CMF 31240006, hashtag-uri electorale si simboluri nationale, constituind astfel propaganda electorala activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024.
